price: It is not for you [O Prophet] to decide whether He will accept their repentance or punish them, for they are wrongdoers.
arabic: لَيۡسَ لَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡأَمۡرِ شَيۡءٌ أَوۡ يَتُوبَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ أَوۡ يُعَذِّبَهُمۡ فَإِنَّهُمۡ ظَٰلِمُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Englsih by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laysa laka mina al-amri shayon aw yatūba ʿalayhim aw yuʿadhibahum fa-innahum ẓālimūna
